languages.text: {n}Характер ран открывает вам участь мертвеца: сначала Глейто отгрыз ему руку, а потом вцепился в горло, попутно разодрав когтями живот.{/n}
{n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Характер ран открывает вам участь мертвеца: сначала Глейто отгрыз ему руку, а потом вцепился в горло, попутно разодрав когтями живот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

{n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

languages.text: {n}傷の様子から、死んだ異種族の運命が分かった。最初にグライトが彼の手を噛み切り、その後喉に歯を食い込み、爪で腹を引き裂いたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}傷の様子から、死んだ異種族の運命が分かった。最初にグライトが彼の手を噛み切り、その後喉に歯を食い込み、爪で腹を引き裂いたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wunden verraten das Schicksal des toten Xenos: Zuerst hat Glaito ihm die Hand abgebissen und dann seine Zähne in seine Kehle gegraben, während er ihm mit den Klauen den Bauch aufriss.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wunden verraten das Schicksal des toten Xenos: Zuerst hat Glaito ihm die Hand abgebissen und dann seine Zähne in seine Kehle gegraben, während er ihm mit den Klauen den Bauch aufriss.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La nature des blessures qui ornent le cadavre ne laisse que peu de doutes sur les méthodes de Glaito : il a tout d'abord entrepris d'arracher la main du Drukhari, avant de refermer sa mâchoire sur sa gorge et lui ouvrir l'abdomen de ses puissantes griffes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La nature des blessures qui ornent le cadavre ne laisse que peu de doutes sur les méthodes de Glaito : il a tout d'abord entrepris d'arracher la main du Drukhari, avant de refermer sa mâchoire sur sa gorge et lui ouvrir l'abdomen de ses puissantes griffes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La naturaleza de las heridas revela el destino del xenos muerto: primero Glaito le arrancó la mano a dentelladas, y luego le hundió los colmillos en la garganta mientras lo destripaba con sus garras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La naturaleza de las heridas revela el destino del xenos muerto: primero Glaito le arrancó la mano a dentelladas, y luego le hundió los colmillos en la garganta mientras lo destripaba con sus garras.{/n}

languages.text: {n}通过尸体上的伤口，你了解到这个黑暗灵族是如何被咬死的。格雷托先是咬掉了他的手，随后尖牙刺入了他的咽喉，利爪撕开了他的肚子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通过尸体上的伤口，你了解到这个黑暗灵族是如何被咬死的。格雷托先是咬掉了他的手，随后尖牙刺入了他的咽喉，利爪撕开了他的肚子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaralara bakarak, ölü zenonun başına gelenleri tahmin ediyorsun. Glaito önce elini kemirmiş, ardından da bir yandan boğazını dişlerken bir yandan da karnını yarmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nature of the wounds reveals the dead xenos's fate: first, Glaito gnawed off his hand, then he sank his teeth into his throat while clawing his stomach open.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaraların şeklinden ölü zenonun başına gelenleri tahmin ediyorsun. Glaito önce elini kemirmiş, ardından da bir yandan boğazını dişlerken bir yandan da karnını yarmış.{/n}
